title: Can you solve my this physics doubt? - Quora

response.answer_text: what is EF in first problem if u want ask method to find electric field then……. u Generally have 2 ways to find electric field at a point first usinG coulumb’s law and second usinG potential. it depends on ur convinience to choose one of them. one try initially usinG coulumb’s law if the fiGure has some sort of symmetry or it is easier to inteGarte the field over the reGion,as in ur second problem. potential method should be used if u already know the potential or it is easier to calculate potential than field in the reGion(as in ur first problem)
